hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Sun Block Room Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #4# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #2# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

GV (Waterfall).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Malon).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Water Temple#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Haunted Wasteland# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Prescription#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Prescription#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Shield# and #a Game Key#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

Spirit Temple MQ GS Nine Thrones Room North

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

LW (Bridge).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Water Temple Small Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #a Water Temple Small Key# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of #hearts#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.
